title: 8-7  Computing GCD
description:
Write a function that return the greatest common divisor between two positive integers using the following hearder:

int gcd(int m, int n)

For example, gcd(24,16) returns 8, and gcd(25,255) returns 5.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
